home2.body: I am fluent in classics like C++, Javascript and Python. My field of Interest's are building new Web Technologies and Products and also in areas related to Deep Learning and Natural Launguage Processing. I also apply my passion for developing products with Node.js and Modern Javascript Library and Frameworks like React.js and Next.js
home2.connect_cta: Feel free to connect with me

about.title: Know Who I'M
about.nameAndFrom: Hello everyone, I'm Elide Portocarrero, a software developer from Peru.
about.studies: As a Software Engineer, I am passionate about creating innovative and efficient technological solutions.
about.activities: Apart from coding, some other activities that I love to do!
about.quote: Strive to build things that make a difference!

projects.title: My Recent Works
projects.subtitle: Here are a few projects I've worked on recently.

descriptions.audioTranscription: An AI-powered tool to convert speech from audio files into text with high accuracy using advanced models.
descriptions.flutterChess: A classic game of chess reimagined as a sleek and responsive mobile application built with Flutter framework.
descriptions.mcmc: Implementation of MCMC algorithms for Bayesian inference, demonstrating complex statistical modeling techniques.
descriptions.translator: A versatile Python tool for translating text and documents between multiple languages seamlessly and efficiently.
descriptions.monsterRolodex: A fun and interactive React application displaying a filterable list of 'monsters' fetched from an API.
descriptions.glbGenerator: A Python script to convert OBJ 3D models and their textures into the efficient GLB file format for web use.
